items.summary: Ensure Gift 2 ("Beautiful You") displays only the user-provided 3 photos (and no placeholder photos) by confirming the Gift 2 gallery is driven by HER_PHOTOS from frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts and that HER_PHOTOS is exactly: ['IMG_0131-1.jpeg','IMG_4617-1.jpeg','IMG_0156-1.jpeg'] in that order.

Ensure the static image assets IMG_0131-1.jpeg, IMG_4617-1.jpeg, and IMG_0156-1.jpeg are present in frontend/public/assets/generated/ with exact matching filenames/case, and that they are actually served by the deployed site at /assets/generated/<filename> so the images load instead of triggering the SafeGeneratedImage fallback.

Rebuild and redeploy the frontend after verifying the assets and config so the latest static files are included, and validate in the live preview that Gift 2 shows the 3 user photos and no placeholder photos.
